==1. Install the Java Virtual Machine==
*Download and install the [http://java.com/ latest version of JRE]*

For Ubuntu users: 
{{{
sudo aptitude install sun-java6-jre
}}}

==2. Download Babiloo==

 * *For WINDOWS*
Download the EXE installer from [http://babiloo.googlecode.com/files/Babiloo-installer.exe here].

 * *For GNU/Linux,MacOS*
Download from [http://babiloo.googlecode.com/files/babiloo.jar here].
In GNU/Linux, !MacOs:
{{{
java -jar babiloo.jar
}}}
